'''Apocalypse Lost''' is a [[World Quest]] Series. The player must complete [[The Dirge of Bilqis]] and [[The Fallen Falcon]] to start this series.

==Pre-Requisites== 
In order to start the quest series, the player must find all 5 "chess pieces":
* [[King Deshret's Pillar]]
* [[Border Fort]]
* [[Soulferry]]
* [[Khaj-Nisut (Quest Item)|Khaj-Nisut]]
* [[Temple of Gurabad]] (requires completion of [["The Falcon's Hunt"]])
The chess pieces must then be placed in the glowing platforms at [[Safhe Shatranj]], which will trigger the initial portion of the quest-chain.
